assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This work and the IRDiRC Scientific Secretariat are supported by the European FP7 contract, “SUPPORT-IRDiRC” (NSuperscript removed305207). H.L. receives funding from the European Commission under FP7 through NeurOmics (NSuperscript removed305121) and RD-Connect (NSuperscript removed305444). C.P.A. contributed to this work in his capacity as Chair of the IRDiRC Consortium Assembly, not as Director of the NCATS. The remaining authors declare that they have no competing interests.
